ForecastingGroupItem.name: ForecastingGroupItem
ForecastingGroupItem.description: Represents the value within the picklist that is specified as the forecasting group for a forecast type. For example, if you have a forecasting group that identifies the industry an opportunity is part of, this object represents the value in the the industry picklist that’s chosen to be part of the group.

DisplayPosition.description: Indicates the order in which the value displays among other values in the group on the forecasts page.

ForecastingGroupId.description: This field is a relationship field.

SourceValueApiName.description: The API name that’s derived from the group value.

SourceValueLabel.description: The label that’s derived from the group value.

SourceValueTranslatedLabel.description: If one exists, the translated version of the group value.
